channel.title: Question
channel.description:
hello,
is it possible to write a skill in a boolean without using case 185 directly or partly. cause im using frame 247 that goes to case 185 that case sends it out to 200 where it is enter X amout i read that amout but can i use it in a boolean ?
otherwise where should i put it
second question is there a possibility thats checks if player is doing something like using item one with item 2?
